Title: solspace/craft-freeform Exposed to Known Axios Vulnerabilities via Precompiled Assets
Description: The latest versions of both 4.x and 5.x are using Axios versions < 1.7.5 and as such are subject to known vulnerabilities as per: https://security.snyk.io/package/npm/axios
AffectedVersions: All versions before 4.1.22, all versions starting from 5.0.0-beta.1 before 5.5.9
NotImpacted: All versions starting from 4.1.22 before 5.0.0-beta.1, all versions starting from 5.5.9
